author: Sebastien Lucot
title: Météo. Une tempête sur le Cotentin pour la Saint-Sylvestre, avec des rafales à 120 km/h | La Presse de la Manche
text:
Voir mon actu Suivre La Presse de la Manche Eole aura marqué les esprits en 2023, avec des coups de vent qui s’enchaînent depuis l’automne sur le nord-ouest de la France . Un nouveau, qualifié de tempête , abordera la façade ouest du département de la Manche dans la soirée de ce samedi 30 décembre 2023.
Même si les vents attendus vont dépasser les 100 km/h , les rafales seront, fort heureusement, bien moins puissantes que lors de la tempête Ciaran du 2 novembre 2023, un événement climatique exceptionnel.
120 km/h de Granville à Cherbourg Cependant, la vigilance sera de mise pour cette tempête nommée Henk . À l’approche d’une perturbation – où les précipitations seront copieuses – le gradient de la pression atmosphérique va nettement se resserrer.
Dès la tombée du jour, les rafales monteront d’un cran pour atteindre leur paroxysme vers minuit , dans un flux de sud à sud-ouest. Elles flirteront avec les 120 km/h de Granville à Cherbourg , sur la côte , possiblement 130 km/h sur les caps exposés .
Entre 22 heures et 1 heure du matin , des bourrasques de l’ordre de 100 km/h pourront balayer l’intérieur des terres , principalement dans l’intérieur du Cotentin.
Dans le centre et le sud de la Manche, elles se cantonneront à des valeurs plus modérées, autour de 80 km/h .
À lire aussi
Tempête Ciarán. Où en est Orange concernant le remplacement des poteaux ? Après une très légère accalmie dans la nuit et la matinée de dimanche, un régime d’averses se mettra en place à l’arrière de la perturbation.
Vidéos : en ce moment sur Actu Les vents, tournant à l’ouest, se renforceront de nouveau dans l’heure de midi et au cours de l’après-midi pour atteindre des valeurs similaires à la veille. Les rafales s’essouffleront ensuite au cours de la nuit de la Saint-Sylvestre et pour le passage à la nouvelle année.
Voir le tweet
Cet événement a été placé en vigilance jaune par les services de Météo-France . Cependant, à l’heure où nous écrivons ces lignes, les météorologues évoquent « un passage en vigilance orange » qui « reste possible », à quelques heures avant le début de l’épisode en fonction « l’évolution de la situation ».
Sur ces deux journées, entre 20 et 30 millimètres de pluie sont prévus, le tout sous une certaine douceur, 10 °C de jour comme de nuit.
Suivez toute l’actualité de vos villes et médias favoris en vous inscrivant à Mon Actu .

author: ANI
title: Save Sharda Committee urge Centre's intervention in Sharda Peeth encroachment issue | Headlines
text: Save Sharda Committee urge Centre's intervention in Sharda Peeth encroachment issue Save Sharda Committee Kashmir, headed by Ravinder Pandita, has urged the Indian government to intervene in removing encroachments at Sharda Peeth in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK). [ANI](/ani-stories)| Updated: 29-12-2023 13:50 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 13:50 IST - Country: - India Save Sharda Committee Kashmir, headed by Ravinder Pandita, has urged the Indian government to intervene in removing encroachments at Sharda Peeth in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK). Highlighting the issue of encroachments, particularly the recent erection of a Coffee Home by the Pakistan army within Sharda Peeth premises, the Save Sharda Committee emphasized the persistent challenges despite a Supreme Court judgment in favour of the Committee on January 3, 2023. Civil society in PoK has joined the Committee in expressing concern about encroachments and damages to the boundary wall. Ravinder Pandita, the committee head and founder, reiterated the demand for Sharda Peeth's reopening, akin to the Kartarpur corridor, as pledged by Home Minister Amit Shah during the inauguration. He warned of a potential LoC march if encroachments, notably the Coffee Home, remain unaddressed by Pakistani authorities. Save Sharda Committee also called for Sharda Peeth to be declared a UNESCO heritage site, underlining its historical and cultural significance. At a press conference hosted today at the Press Club Bengaluru, the Save Sharda Committee Kashmir unveiled a website dedicated to the Sharda Temple in Teetwal, Kashmir. The newly launched website aims to serve as a comprehensive guide for pilgrims and tourists, offering information on the recently reconstructed Sharda Temple and Sikh Gurudwara. Inaugurated on March 22, the structures saw live streaming by Home Minister Sh. Amit Shah, LG J&K Sh. Manoj Sinha, MP South Bangalore Tejasvi Surya, and Save Sharda Committee's Head/Founder Ravinder Pandita. Supported by Dakshinayam Sringeri Mutt, the Sharda Yatra Temple has drawn around 10,000 pilgrims since its inauguration earlier this year. The Committee has already communicated its concerns to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and President PoK (AJK) through letters dated November 30, 2023. The Civil society of PoK has also echoed these sentiments in letters addressed to relevant authorities. Sharada Peeth is considered as one of the three holiest sites of pilgrimage for Kashmiri Pandits, alongside the Martand Sun Temple and the Amarnath Temple. (ANI) (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) author: Joane Bérubé
title: L'insécurité alimentaire interpelle les cégeps
text:
L’insécurité alimentaire interpelle les cégeps
Les étudiants du collégial sont de plus en plus nombreux à ne pas se nourrir convenablement. (Photo d'archives)
Photo : getty images/istockphoto / MurzikNata
Tant au Cégep de Matane qu’au Cégep de la Gaspésie-Les Îles, les résultats d’enquêtes et d’une recherche récentes sur l’insécurité alimentaire démontrent l’ampleur de ce phénomène.
Les chercheurs ont notamment rencontré des étudiants du Cégep de Matane lors de leurs travaux, dont les résultats ont été publiés cette semaine dans La Presse. En moyenne, plus de quatre étudiants sur dix éprouveraient de l’insécurité alimentaire dans l’ensemble des établissements visités. C’est un étudiant sur deux à Matane.
C’est une situation qui a des conséquences graves sur la réussite, sur la concentration, sur la détresse psychologique des étudiants
, reconnaît le directeur des affaires étudiantes au Cégep de Matane, Jérôme Forget.
L'insécurité alimentaire peut avoir de graves répercussions sur le parcours scolaire. (Photo d'archives)
Photo : iStock
Au Cégep de la Gaspésie et des Îles-de-la-Madeleine, un peu moins de la moitié des étudiants affirment qu'ils s’alimentent bien. C’est ce qui ressort d’une enquête annuelle réalisée depuis 2023 par cet établissement auprès de ses étudiants.
Le fait de ne pas manger à sa faim a de lourdes conséquences, constate le directeur des affaires étudiantes du Cégep de Matane. Les personnes étudiantes qui souffrent d’insécurité alimentaire ont trois fois plus de risques de souffrir de dépression, deux fois plus de risques d’avoir un trouble anxieux, puis elles vont être trois fois plus susceptibles de reporter à plus tard la poursuite de leurs études
, dit-il.
Jérôme Forget note que l’insécurité alimentaire n’est pas toujours une question d’argent. Parfois, dit-il, c’est une question de manque de connaissances ou de compétences culinaires, voire une question de santé mentale ou encore une désorganisation temporelle après avoir quitté le nid familial.
La désorganisation de la journée désorganise la prise des repas
, observe le responsable des affaires étudiantes, qui souligne qu’à Matane, les deux tiers des étudiants quittent leur région natale pour venir étudier au cégep.
Françoise Leblanc-Perreault, directrice adjointe des études et registraire au Cégep de la Gaspésie et des Îles, fait part elle aussi de l’importance du contingent d’étudiants hors de chez eux sur les différents campus de cet établissement collégial.
D'après elle, les étudiants étrangers doivent relever des défis encore plus grands pour s’alimenter en raison du fait qu’ils sont de nouveaux arrivants. C’est, dit-elle, un défi supplémentaire dans leur planification financière.
De l'aide
Néanmoins, dans ces deux établissements, du soutien est disponible pour aider les étudiants qui ont des difficultés à manger convenablement. L’aide est là.
Des réfrigérateurs permettent aux étudiants de déposer leurs surplus alimentaires pour d'autres qui en auraient besoin. (Photo d'archives)
Photo : Radio-Canada / Fabienne Tercaefs
Le Cégep de Matane a converti des locaux en garde-manger et de la distribution de paniers alimentaires a lieu chaque semaine. Des frigos de partage et des armoires d’urgence ont été installés, mais beaucoup d'étudiants ne se sentent pas concernés, raconte Jérôme Forget.
Ce qu’ils [les chercheurs] ont constaté, dit-il, et ce qui les a beaucoup surpris, c’est que même si les collèges et les réseaux communautaires mettent en place toutes sortes de formules d’aide alimentaire, les étudiants vont très peu avoir recours à cette aide en se disant toujours "Mais ce n’est pas pour moi". Souvent, ils ne vont carrément pas la chercher.
Le Cégep organise aussi du transport en autobus pour faciliter le déplacement vers les épiceries. De l’aide financière d’urgence existe aussi.
Un fonds de dépannage existe aussi au Cégep de la Gaspésie-Les Îles. Les demandes sont passées de cinq en 2017-2018 à 26 l’an dernier. Le Cégep a aussi un programme de soutien alimentaire et les associations étudiantes fournissent un petit déjeuner lors des périodes d’examen.

author: Telegraph Herald
title: Police: 1 hurt in Dubuque crash
text: Police said one person was injured in a single-vehicle crash in Dubuque. Dakes O. Eliam, 59, of Maquoketa, Iowa, was transported by ambulance to UnityPoint Health-Finley Hospital for treatment of his injuries, according to Dubuque police. Current conditions in Dubuque, IA Police said one person was injured in a single-vehicle crash in Dubuque. Dakes O. Eliam, 59, of Maquoketa, Iowa, was transported by ambulance to UnityPoint Health-Finley Hospital for treatment of his injuries, according to Dubuque police. Police reported that Eliam was driving north on U.S. 61 near the U.S. 151 exit at approximately 5:45 a.m. Thursday, when he fell asleep at the wheel. The vehicle left the roadway and struck four poles holding a cable guard rail. Eliam was cited with operation of a motor vehicle with an expired license, failure to provide proof of financial liability and failure to maintain control. {{description}} Email notifications are only sent once a day, and only if there are new matching items. {{description}} Email notifications are only sent once a day, and only if there are new matching items. author: PA News Agency
title: Venezuela to hold military exercises as British warship heads to Guyana | Your Local Guardian
text: President Nicolas Maduro has ordered Venezuela’s armed forces to conduct defensive exercises in the Eastern Caribbean after the UK sent a warship towards Guyana’s territorial waters as the South American neighbours dispute a large border region. In a nationally televised address on Thursday, Mr Maduro said 6,000 Venezuelan troops, including air and naval forces, will conduct joint operations off the nation’s eastern coast — near the border with Guyana. Mr Maduro described the impending arrival of British ship HMS Trent to Guyana’s shores as a “threat” to his country. He argued the ship’s deployment violates a recent agreement between the South American nations. “We believe in diplomacy, in dialogue and in peace, but no one is going to threaten Venezuela,” Mr Maduro said in a room where he was accompanied by a dozen military commanders. “This is an unacceptable threat to any sovereign country in Latin America.” Venezuela and Guyana are involved in a border dispute over the Essequibo, a sparsely populated region the size of Florida with vast oil deposits off its shores. The region has been under Guyana’s control for decades. But in December, Venezuela relaunched its historical claim to the Essequibo through a referendum in which it asked voters in the country whether the Essequibo should be turned into a Venezuelan state. As tensions over the region escalated, the leaders of both countries met in the Caribbean island of St Vincent and signed an agreement which said they would solve their dispute through nonviolent means. During the talks, however, Guyana’s President Irfan Ali said his nation reserved its right to work with its partners to ensure the defence of his country. On Thursday, Guyanese officials described the visit of HMS Trent as a planned activity aimed at improving the nation’s defence capabilities and said the ship’s visit will continue as scheduled. “Nothing that we do or have done is threatening Venezuela,” Guyana’s vice-president Bharrat Jagdeo told reporters in Georgetown, the nation’s capital. HMS Trent is a patrol and rescue ship that was recently used to intercept drug traffickers off the West Coast of Africa. It can accommodate up to 30 sailors and a contingent of 18 marines and is equipped with 30mm cannons and a landing pad for helicopters and drones. The ship had been sent to Barbados in early December to intercept drug traffickers, but its mission was changed on December 24, when it was sent to Guyana. Authorities did not specify when it was expected to arrive off Guyana’s shores. The UK’s Ministry of Defence said the ship would be conducting joint operations with Guyana’s defence forces. The nation of 800,000 people has a small military that is made up of 3,000 soldiers, 200 sailors and four small patrol boats known as Barracudas. author: Keenan McCall
title: My Hero Academia 2024 Chapter Release Date Calendar
text: The My Hero Academia manga is entering its final stretch, which means 2024 may well be the best—and last—year in the series’ history. That’s why we’ve constructed this guide covering when every new My Hero Academia chapter is coming out to help ensure you don’t miss a moment. When Do My Hero Academia Manga Chapters Come out? Explained As is the case with most Shonen Jump series, My Hero Academia chapters release in three key ways throughout any given week, so long as they don’t come out around a holiday break. Raws of the latest chapter typically hit the internet on Thursdays around 6 a.m. EST. These aren’t the best way to see the chapter in its entirety, but they do at least allow you to see some of the highlights of the chapter before it’s completely translated. Fan translations, meanwhile, usually come out on Fridays around 8 a.m. EST. These might include some translation errors, but you can rest assured that you’re reading the entire chapter. Finally, the official release and translation of chapters comes out on Sundays at 10 a.m. EST normally and at 11 a.m. EST during Daylight Savings Time via the [official Shonen Jump website and app](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia). Though this is the least timely way to read a chapter, it’s the version with the fewest translation errors and supports the series’ official release legally. It’s also worth noting that the series has been known to space out its releases based on the needs of its author Kohei Horikoshi. When this occurs, there could be an extra week or two between chapters, either because of Horikoshi’s health or the need for more time to fully illustrate the next part of the story. Every My Hero Academia Chapter Release Date, Listed Below you’ll find a table compiling every known chapter release date for 2024. Do be aware, however, that the Raws and fan translations are technically illegal and don’t support the official release. Check them out at your own discretion. |My Hero Academia Chapter #||Raws Release Date||Fan Translation Release Date||Official Release Date| |My Hero Academia 411||Out Now||Out Now||Jan. 5 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 412||Jan. 17 around 6 a.m. EST||Jan. 19 around 8 a.m. EST||Jan. 21 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 413||Jan. 24 around 6 a.m. EST||Jan. 26 around 8 a.m. EST||Jan. 28 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 414||Feb. 14 around 6 a.m. EST||Feb. 16 around 8 a.m. EST||Feb. 18 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 415||Feb. 22 around 6 a.m. EST||Feb. 23 around 8 a.m. EST||Feb. 25 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 416||Mar. 7 around 6 a.m. EST||Mar. 8 around 8 a.m. EST||Mar. 10 @ 10 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 417||Mar. 14 around 6 a.m. EST||Mar. 15 around 8 a.m. EST||Mar. 17 @ 11 a.m. EST| |My Hero Academia 418||TBA||TBA||TBA| My Hero Academia Chapter 417 Release Date and Spoilers With all that out of the way, you might now want to know if there are any My Hero Academia Chapter 417 spoilers prior to its official Mar. 10 release date. Though it’s still too early for any viable Raws to be out in the wild, the events of My Hero Academia 416 made the series’ current trajectory pretty clear: Midoriya is going to see what happened to Shigaraki, which will likely allow him to reach the destruction-driven inheritor of All for One in a last gambit to stop him. Or at least, that’s the best case scenario. It’s also entirely possible Shigaraki will double down on his desire to watch the world burn even with Midoriya’s pleading, forcing a less than ideal conclusion to their confrontation. Whether that means Midoriya has to finish off Shigaraki or the villain is simply unsavable remains to be seen, but you can bet it won’t be a perfectly happy ending. But then, this is all guess work on our part. We won’t know for sure what Horikoshi has in store until the new chapter releases later this week. Is My Hero Academia Ending in 2024? Explained That last point leads into an important question you need to be aware of as you read the series: Is My Hero Academia ending in 2024? For now, our answer leans heavily toward it ending before the year is through. As laid out above, there aren’t many more conflicts to wrap up before the series’ conclusion, so it’s wouldn’t be a stretch to say the series will conclude once Midoriya and Shigaraki’s fight is done. However, Horikoshi and Shonen Jump haven’t made any official announcements about the series’ conclusion at this time. We can take this to mean that there might be a few more months left of chapters to go, or even that there might be enough story to get through that it could last all the way through to the end of the year. We’ll be keeping an eye out for any official announcements regarding the series’ conclusion, and will update this article accordingly once such news is made available. Now that you’re all caught up on when this year’s My Hero Academia chapters are coming out, you can get caught up on the release calendars for other hot series like [Chainsaw Man](https://twinfinite.net/guides/chainsaw-man-2024-manga-chapter-release-date-calendar/) and [Jujutsu Kaisen](https://twinfinite.net/guides/jujutsu-kaisen-2024-chapter-release-date-calendar-2024/).

author: Gustavo Vilhena
title: Anitta perde 100 mil seguidores e agradece: 'limpa limpa limpa'; veja o porquê! | Cultura | O Liberal
text:
Anitta perde 100 mil seguidores e agradece: ‘limpa limpa limpa’; veja o porquê!
A perda de seguidores se deu depois da artista publicar uma foto em um terreiro de candomblé
Após compartilhar fotos em um terreiro de candomblé, a cantora Anitta comentou que pode ter perdido cerca de 100 mil seguidores em seu perfil no instagram. Nesta quarta-feira (29), a artista publicou fotos em que aparece vestida com trajes brancos, tradicionais das religiões de matriz africana. Seguidora da religião desde 2013, Anitta frequenta o local com sua família frequentemente.
VEJA MAIS
Nas imagens, a cantora aparece ao lado de seu pai de santo, Sergio Pina, em um terreiro localizado na Baixada Fluminense do Rio de Janeiro. Após o post, a cantora se pronunciou sobre a perda de seguidores: “E lá se vão 100 mil seguidores. Toda vez que posto foto no terreiro é isso. Limpa, limpa, limpa.”, declarou.
Anitta já viveu diversos momentos de rejeição por expor a sua fé. Em maio de 2024, foram mais de 200 mil seguidores que deixaram de seguir a cantora logo após o anúncio do lançamento do clipe de “Aceita”, que faz referências ao candomblé. “É um clipe em que mostro a minha religião. Não só a minha, mas a de todos os envolvidos nessa produção. Tem várias religiões no clipe.”, desabafou a cantora na época.
COMPARTILHE ESSA NOTÍCIA

author: Auto News Desk
title: Lima Shawnee comes up short in matchup with St. Marys
text:
St. Marys collected a solid win over Lima Shawnee in a 44-33 verdict at Shawnee High on Jan. 30 in Ohio girls high school basketball action.
Last time St Marys and Lima Shawnee played in a 51-25 game on Jan. 25, 2024.
In recent action on Jan. 23, Lima Shawnee faced off against Wapakoneta and St Marys took on Van Wert on Jan. 23 at Van Wert High School.

author: @agensir
title: Nicaragua: arrestato il vicario generale di Managua, a Matagalpa si impedisce di pronunciare il nome del vescovo Álvarez durante le messe - AgenSIR
text: Si intensifica la persecuzione del regime di Daniel Ortega e Rosario Murillo contro la Chiesa cattolica. È stato confermato dai media e siti indipendenti nicaraguensi e dall’attivista e avvocata Martha Patricia Molina l’arresto, avvenuto ieri, di mons. Carlos Avilés, vicario generale dell’arcidiocesi di Managua. Il sacerdote, che in passato non aveva risparmiato critiche al regime, sarebbe detenuto nel terzo distretto di polizia di Managua. L’arresto fa seguito alle dichiarazioni offensive della vicepresidente e moglie di Ortega, Rosario Murillo, contro sacerdoti e vescovi, che ha definito “diavoli” durante il suo discorso di mercoledì 27 dicembre. Nel frattempo, si è appreso che i sacerdoti della diocesi di Matagalpa, in Nicaragua, sono stati costretti a rimuovere il nome di mons. Rolando Álvarez (che dal febbraio scorso si trova in carcere, dopo una condanna a 26 anni) dalla preghiera eucaristica, per evitare di essere arrestati dalla polizia sandinista. Durante la messa mattutina del 24 dicembre, padre Jáder Guido, secondo vicario della cattedrale, aveva recitato la consueta formula “conferma la tua chiesa pellegrina, Papa Francesco, il nostro vescovo Rolando José, i sacerdoti e i diaconi”. Poco dopo il sacerdote è stato arrestato e rilasciato solo in tarda serata. Il 25 dicembre, durante le messe di Natale, padre Guido non ha più menzionato il nome di mons. Rolando José Álvarez, ma ha detto solo “il nostro vescovo”.

author: UOL
title: Arteta classifica derrota do Arsenal como "decepcionante" e despista sobre novos reforços
text: Nesta quinta-feira, o Arsenal desperdiçou a chance de reassumir a liderança da Premier League. Pela 19ª rodada, os Gunners foram derrotados pelo West Ham, em casa, por 2 a 0. Os mandantes acumularam 30 finalizações contra o adversário, e, por isso, o técnico Mikel Arteta classificou o resultado como "decepcionante". "Quero parabenizar o West Ham e elogiar meus jogadores, é só isso que posso dizer. Isso é o futebol. Você vê o que fizemos durante o jogo, como criamos... e o resultado é decepcionante, mas eles foram melhores que nós em ambas as áreas. Eles tiveram dois chutes no gol, três se contar o pênalti, e nós tivemos 30", afirmou o espanhol em coletiva pós-jogo. Arteta ainda complementou: "No futebol, você precisa fazer isso melhor (finalizar) se quiser vencer. Hoje, não ganhamos por conta disso. De resto, o time continuou tentando e teve uma ótima atitude novamente". O comandante dos Gunners também disse que acredita que a má fase do ataque não esteja relacionada à falta de confiança dos atletas. "Você chuta na trave, ou você finaliza e a bola não entra por meio centímetro, ou alguém bloqueia o chute e a bola não entra. Também perdemos muitas oportunidades na escolha do último passe. Isso faz a diferença para vencer os jogos". Quando questionado se o Arsenal iria atrás de algum jogador para resolver os problemas de conversão de chances, o treinador despistou e deixou claro que está feliz com o elenco que tem em mãos. "O que temos são estes jogadores, e são estes atletas que eu amo muito. O que temos que fazer é nos colocarmos em situações melhores e treinar mais. Temos que colocá-los lá e aumentar a confiança deles, porque eles já fizeram grandes coisas", concluiu. O Arsenal foi ultrapassado pelo Liverpool, que venceu e alcançou 42 pontos no Inglês. Com 40, o time de Londres terminou a rodada na segunda colocação. O próximo desafio da equipe de Arteta será neste domingo, às 11 horas (de Brasília), contra o Fulham, em Craven Cottage. ? "We have to learn from it and make sure we get sharper and better in front of the goals." Our skipper on the missed chances tonight ? ? Arsenal (@Arsenal) [December 29, 2023](https://twitter.com/Arsenal/status/1740523635087978738?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
